channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tiny Chef’s new gig with Ikea is the hopeful job news we all needed
item.description: Finally, some good news: the Tiny Chef, who captured the hearts of internet users around the world this summer, when his Nickelodeon show was cancelle...

item.title: China bans Tesla-style doors because they’re a public safety hazard
item.description: China has become the first nation to outlaw the Tesla-style concealed door handle. Demanded by Elon Musk against the safety concerns of his own engine...

item.title: OpenAI launches Codex app to bring its coding models, which were used to build viral OpenClaw, to more users
item.description: OpenAI is locked in an increasingly intense battle with rival Anthropic over tools to create AI agents. The debut of the Codex app comes weeks after A...

item.title: SpaceX Seeks Approval for a Million Satellites in Orbit. The Goal Is to Change Civilization
item.description: The company is planning ways to meet the energy and computing needs of AI, even as the company mulls a merger with xAI.

item.title: Why Bitcoin is in a bear market: Analyst points to 3 factors after currency swoons below $75,000
item.description: The original cryptocurrency recovered slightly on Monday.

item.title: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
item.description: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

item.title: Trump cuts tariffs on India to 18% after Modi agrees to stop buying Russian oil
item.description: President Donald Trump said Monday that he plans to lower tariffs on goods from India to 18%, from 25%, after Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi agre...

item.title: This One Exercise Habit Could Help You Live Longer, Study Says
item.description: It’s all about how you choose to work out.

item.title: Trump Just Unveiled an $11.7 Billion Plan to Protect U.S. Industries From China’s Grip on Critical Minerals
item.description: The new proposal would let manufacturers lock in mineral prices amid global uncertainty.

item.title: Trump administration to launch ‘Project Vault’—a $12 billion stockpile of rare earth elements
item.description: The Trump administration plans to deploy nearly $12 billion to create a strategic reserve of rare earth elements, a stockpile that could counter China...

item.title: Longevity Influencer Peter Attia Breaks Silence After Being Named in Hundreds of the Newly Released Epstein Files
item.description: Justice Department files released last week reference Attia more than 1,700 times.

item.title: ‘We are an n of 1’: Palantir hails ‘incredible’ earnings as stock rockets nearly 8% after hours
item.description: Palantir looks into its all-seeing orb and sees full-year revenue between $7.18 billion and $7.2 billion.

item.title: Decisiveness Is the Most Underrated Leadership Skill
item.description: You don’t have to be right every time, but you must move forward.

item.title: If AI is roiling the job market, the data isn’t showing it, Yale Budget Lab report says, raising questions of ‘AI-washing’ to justify mass layoffs
item.description: Some analysts have projected AI will displace 7% of U.S. workers. Yale economists said it’s just too early to tell.

item.title: Oracle chases $50 billion for AI buildout as doubts mount on Wall Street
item.description: Oracle shares fell 2% Monday following the company’s announcement it planned to raise upwards to $50 billion in 2026. Funding rounds of that size are ...
